Durant Sihlali (5 Machị 1935 - 2004), bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa
A mụrụ ya na Germiston, ọ bụ Onye isi nke Fine Arts na Federated Union of Black Artists (Fuba) site n'afọ 1983 ruo 2004 ma gosipụta ihe ngosi ya na Nuremberg, Athens, na Palermo.
Ọ gụrụ nka na Moroko Chiawelo Centre site na 1950 ruo 1953
Site na 1953 ruo 1958 ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru Cecil Skotnes na Polly Street Art Centre.
Ọrụ ya bụ nke oge a na nke dị adị na nke mbụ ya bụ agba mmiri

O mechara tụgharịa gaa n'ịkpụ ihe site na iji ígwè sitere na ụgbọ ala mebiri emebi. N'oge mmalite afọ 1980, Sihlali mepụtara usoro ihe osise osisi a tụrụ atụ nke ndị ọrụ na ebe a na-egwupụta coal nke Witwatersrand. O gosipụtara na Trees Collection Gallery na Beverly Hills. Dị ka nwunye Sihlali Anna si kwuo, ọ chọrọ mgbe niile ịmepụta ebe ngosi nka nke ọrụ ya.
